verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: has] hired a new communications guy who ’s ready to rumble with the press — perhaps literally .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] has [V: hired] [ARG1: a new communications guy who ’s ready to rumble with the press — perhaps literally] .
Donald Trump has hired [ARG1: a new communications guy] [R-ARG1: who] [V: ’s] [ARG2: ready to rumble with the press — perhaps literally] .
Donald Trump has hired a new communications guy [ARG0: who] ’s ready to [V: rumble] [ARGM-MNR: with the press] — [ARGM-ADV: perhaps literally] .
